name: IAIGIRI
description:
each other sword waving phone.
Early-cutting game Iaigiri! !

I can play with two people.
(phone, app one each 2)

Game Overview
------------------------
Sound flows When you start the game.
Each other, I will take the system to swing the Phone.
I shake the Phone at the moment when the sound has stopped.
Previously cut-out people of victory!
If clipping is slow I will cut.
※ You can not cut in practice

Video below URL

QR code is what you need when you start the game.

Participants read the QR code.
